articles.title: Nvidia's RTX Video Super Resolution Upscaling Tech Adds Support for RTX 20 Series GPUs - IGN
articles.description: Thanks to a new GPU driver, RTX 20 series owners now have access to RTX Video Super Resolution, an upscaling tool released by Nvidia earlier this year to enhance the visual quality of older and/or blurry videos.
articles.content: Nvidia is leveling up the gaming experience for RTX 20 Series GPU owners, as a new GPU driver now allows these older RTX GPUs to use RTX Video Super Resolution upscaling technology to upscale old blu… [+1867 chars]
